named-query.name: BpJpaKeyIndexedProperty_getKeyIndexedPropertyByPropertyId
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM BpJpaKeyIndexedProperty p where p.propertyId = :propertyId

named-query.name: BpJpaKeyIndexedProperty_removeByElementId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM BpJpaKeyIndexedProperty p WHERE p.elementId = :elementId
